title: i hate support meta
body: i hate nati, leona, trehs, braum wiht cancer cc adn being tanker then the tanks while still doing stupid damage. if you get a support liken ami in your team you know its lost since support like her is super useless

replies.body: Hello it is the tank meta, of course you will see more tanks filling the support role. This is not nor has there ever been a "support" meta.

> [{quoted}](name=Malix Farwin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3vHaEI6Q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-10T08:09:28.922+0000)
>
> Hello it is the tank meta, of course you will see more tanks filling the support role. This is not nor has there ever been a "support" meta.

0 CS support is a thing. It is as much part of the meta as having tanks on your team.

> [{quoted}](name=Malix Farwin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=3vHaEI6Q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-10T08:09:28.922+0000)
>
> Hello it is the tank meta, of course you will see more tanks filling the support role. This is not nor has there ever been a "support" meta.

kog and 4 supports op
Don't see how tank meta affects supports, tbh. Leona, Thresh, Blitz and even Braum have always been relatively popular compared to squishy supports. Only new one I can think of is Nautilus.
Sorry but you need to read over your post before you send it up cause I see quite a few errors there....c+
Last I checked the squishy supports haven't been suffering at all. I still main them, haven't had any more issue against the tanks than I ever did (which is none).
Nami's a great support, and Janna has the highest win rate of any support.
